name: Da Cube Adventure
description:
Da Cube Adventure - is an isometric minimalistic puzzle game, where you play as a lime cube that can move.

Solve puzzles, find easter eggs and have fun.

This is a small prototype of the game, while the graphics won't change much, the mechanics certainly will.

CONTROLS
  • WASD for movement
  • T to switch between isometric and up view
  • Other controls are specified in game’s tutorial popup

I'm sorry, if you've encountered any bugs or lags playing browser version, this is my first browser and public game!

DOESN’T WORK ON MOBILE DEVICES
